Highlights MYKONOS AND MONASTERY - Discover the charm of Mykonos on a coastal drive with views of Delos, luxury resorts, and anchored yachts. Pause for photos at Agios Ioannis Beach before heading inland to Ano Mera, where a guided tour of the 16th-century Panagia Tourliani Monastery reveals the island’s spiritual side. Enjoy traditional Greek meze with ouzo, then wander the whitewashed lanes of Mykonos Town. The tour ends at a 15th-century bakery, still baking fluffy breads in a wood-fired oven. A VISIT TO AMBELONAS WINE ESTATE - Stroll through vineyards and olive groves in the company of the estate’s owner, who shares stories of the land and its traditions. Then, savour a tasting of wines and delicacies crafted right on the estate, a true reflection of Corfu’s rich flavours. BICYCLE ADVENTURE IN KONAVLE VALLEY -Set off from the village of Čilipi and cycle through the stunning Croatian countryside. Along the way, stop at a 15th-century mill, where the miller shares how flour is still produced using traditional methods.
